content: उद्भिद् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> To break up. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} To break out, burst forth, become visible, be produced; अद्यापि पक्षावपि नोद्भिद्येते <ls>K. 347</ls>; उद्भिद्यमानपक्ष तिः <ls n="K.">33</ls>, <ls n="K.">29</ls>, <ls n="K.">46</ls>; उद्भिन्नपयोधरया <ls>K. 100</ls> developed; <ls>Ve. 4. 10.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To bring out, develop, unfold; <ls>Mu. 4. 3.</ls>

उद्भिद् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्-भिद्-क्विप्] {@--1@} Sprouting, germinating, shooting forth. {@--2@} Penetrating. {@--3@} Destroying. {@--4@} Causing to come forth. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A sprout or shoot (of a plant); अंकुरोऽभिनवोद्भिदि <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--2@} A plant; उद्भिदस्तरुगुल्माद्याः <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--3@} A spring, fountain.
